programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 15
programme.desc: The Gang's in Dublin! Dennis longs for a charming, authentic European experience, but ends up helping Frank with some of his business's dirty work. Mac and Charlie learn about their Irish heritage. Dee rushes to the set of an Irish soap opera.

programme.title: Frogger
programme.desc: The worldwide megahit Frogger franchise hops to life like never before in an outrageously fun, new physical competition series based on the beloved and iconic 1980s video game from Konami. Hosted by Damon Wayans Jr. and Kyle Brandt, "Frogger" invites contestants from across the country to test their physical prowess and problem-solving skills on a variety of epic and imaginative obstacle courses filled with challenges from the classic game.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed
programme.desc: Animals Unleashed is a user-generated content show that features the most unpredictable and hilarious animal clips from around the world. From the wild to the living room, each episode showcases animals at their most surprising, mischievous and outrageous! Each action-packed episode features the very best animal clips available packaged into related segments, features, or even games, all with highly-entertaining narration.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S1
programme.desc: The teams must reinvent the classic Eton mess while also tackling an exceedingly tricky challenge making perfect miniature classics, including 24 tartes au citron.

programme.title: Ultimate Tag
programme.desc: It's age versus experience as an 18-year-old student, a police officer, and a parkour professional step into the Tag Arena to try and outrun the fearsome pro Taggers to win a cash prize. The battle is physical, requires nerves of steel and there's only one rule: Don't. Get. Caught.

programme.title: Ultimate Tag
programme.desc: A stuntman, a parkour teacher and a lifeguard are just 3 of the remarkable Americans stepping into the Tag Arena to win a cash prize. They need skill, speed and agility to outrun the exceptional pro Taggers, over 5 grueling courses. And there's just one rule: Don't. Get. Caught!

programme.title: I Can See Your Voice
programme.desc: A night of suspense and guessing continues with host Ken Jeong, our contestant, will attempt to weed out the bad Secret Voices from the good. In the end, the singer whom the contestant picks will reveal if they are good or bad in a duet performance with musical superstar Rick Springfield.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth
programme.desc: This landmark six-part documentary series charts the planet's most spectacular events of migration, rebirth and transformation. Over the course of a turbulent year, we witness how finely tuned creatures face the Earth's seasonal patterns. However, in the 21st Century these patterns are becoming more extreme, less predictable and dangerously unreliable. From Asia to Europe, Africa, Australia, North and South America - we witness the drama & the spectacle.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Evolution S2
programme.desc: Valt Aoi, who participated in the Japanese Championship, was scouted for the prestigious Spanish team BC Sol and heads out to Spain. With their sights set on the world, Valt and his friends begin their challenge for the World League!

programme.title: Miniforce S1
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Volt, Sammy, Max and Lucy are special agents of a secret animal force called the 'Miniforce'. When danger arises, they transform into human-sized armored agents and fights for justice against avenging villains with the help of mentors and colleagues!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S2
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.desc: Sloppy and Cherry set up train tracks around the house to deliver food to them anytime, anywhere! Things quickly go off the rails. The Triangle Aliens are back for a visit and an exciting game of hide-and-seek!

programme.title: The School Bell Rings S2
programme.desc: A famous pop star rolls into town for a one-night concert, and Khai sneaks out to catch a glimpse of his idol, with Lily following him secretly. Meanwhile, Wei Shi and KK embroil themselves in a pager conversation with a stranger.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Undiagnosed
programme.desc: (Encore) Your child is developing slower than others their age - doctors tell you they have a genetic condition, but all tests come back normal. This is the story of those who have been Undiagnosed.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) Clarifying, vegan and even powder. Choosing shampoos can be head scratching. Munah Bagharib demystifies the range of shampoos and finds out if what you're using could be the root of your hair issues.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Khatijah and Iskandar come face to face with their father and he has a surprise in store for them. Arasi nearly crosses a line with Jared while Melvin finds a new shop assistant for Swatow.

programme.title: Jo Frost: Nanny On Tour S1
programme.desc: Jo Frost is a parenting expert who's spent years teaching parents and kids how to get along better. From new-borns and toddlers to tweens and teens, a lot of parents struggle to communicate and compromise, and in this new reality series we join Jo as she meets families across America who are falling apart.

programme.title: Taste Of Australia With Hayden Quinn S3
programme.desc: Hayden travels to Kangaroo Island and meets up with a beekeeper, then travels to a fig farm to get some figs to cook with. Hayden then swims with dolphins, before heading to a local winery where he cooks up a recipe using figs and honey for his new friends.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Sarah decides to intervene when Rose is depressed and binging on junk food and bubble tea. Damien and Mandy are increasingly worried about Arasi as she seems to get closer to Jared. Chandra feels bad for Khatijah, having encouraged her to confront someone from her past.

programme.desc: A reclused old man finds a stray cat at his doorstep. Initially annoyed by the animal, he discovers a strange connection with the cat that helps him reconnect with a part of himself that has been lost through years of anger, loneliness and regret.

programme.desc: 癌症是目前全球第二大死因，全球将近六分之一的死亡由癌症造成，数据惊人。本集健康密码医疗组包括肿瘤及癌症放射科专科Prof Ho何国煌医生，中医肿瘤专科陈海乾医师，带领大家通过遗传基因学，提醒大家除了根据家族癌症种类病史去判断自己得癌的可能性，更应关注癌症基因，如携有BRCA、HNPCC基因者，可能遗传了先天性基因突变，患癌风险比常人高，应时刻关注身体状况，适时进行相关癌症筛查；而中医则结合父母体质遗传给小孩的肾气作为体质强弱的观察，可见中西医都认同基因本身对体质及遗传疾病都有一定的影响，明白了先天的不足，.

programme.desc: (重) 小树随直树来到2035年，发现2035年的直树确实很失败。 他不但被老板开除，被女友思思抛弃，还失去小童和朝伟这两位好友。直树和小树正感灰心时，大耳窿前来追债。两人立刻逃跑，同时许愿回到2020年，跟着瞬间消失在空气中….

programme.title: 星期二特写 ：我依然精彩
programme.desc: (重) 1980年代末，陈兆锦和拍档华亮，以令人爆笑的诙谐表演红遍新马。自从华亮在1995年因车祸去世后，兆锦也从电视荧幕消失。原来他把心思转向校园讲故事。前配音导播刘诗璇，参与电视台戏剧组最辉煌时期的译配工作。她擅于以声传情，也热爱话剧表演，1999年以《七彩学堂》中校长的角色出位，成为活跃的演员和导师。.

programme.title: 权听你说

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(大结局) 转眼数年过去了，月娘挣钱把黄家祖宅买回来，让黄元、桂花等人搬回去住。丽贝儿催促陈锡回新加坡。长桌宴上，陈锡终于和月娘团聚。.

programme.title: 锦心似玉
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(重) 明朝年间，庶女罗十一娘（谭松韵饰）虽地位卑微却极有主见，认为女子眼光不应局限于内宅格局，她希望能凭靠精湛的刺绣技艺争取所向往的自由人生。意外嫁给永平侯大将军徐令宜（钟汉良饰）后，她用乐观积极的心态对待身边的每一个人，依靠努力收获徐家上下的信任，重新执掌中馈。徐令宜被十一娘的种种美好品性而吸引，继而为之动心。两人几经周折情愫暗生，先婚后爱相知相许。在丈夫的支持下，十一娘开绣坊仙绫阁，努力传承刺绣技艺。而永平侯徐令宜，为维护家国安宁，改善民生，力挺开放海禁，经历重重困难。.

programme.title: 脚踏食地
programme.desc: “脚踏食地” 透过一趟的旅程，欣赏美丽的风景至于，也挖掘不一样的美食。第一站，我们来到 Tanjung Karang, 原来在瓜拉雪兰莪这一带有不少祖籍的爪哇人。不常吃马来传统食物的文杰第一次尝到了Nasi Ambeng, Nasi Ambeng 是爪哇人在办婚礼，分娩，祈祷等重要日子的传统食物。也因年近70的IBU的坚守，才让我们在日常当中也可以品尝到这传统滋味呢。沿着西海岸公路， Tanjung Karang 出了有旷阔的田野，在Bukit Melawati 山上还可以看到成群结队的银叶猴，他们非常温.
